body.p: There are a number of other differences between IFRS 16 and the decisions made by the FASB, mainly because of the different decisions reached on the lessee accounting model. This Basis for Conclusions summarises only the reasons for decisions made by the IASB and reflected in IFRS 16. Paragraphs BC303–BC310 summarise the differences between IFRS 16 and the decisions made by the FASB.
